page.title: 20Our Domesday Survey Credits.
page.content: This Domesday Survey entry was compiled by the children and staff of {Grass Royal Junior School, Yeovil, {Somerset}during the summer of 1985. Our intention has been to involve as many people as possible. Over 300 children between the ages of 7 and 11 years have been involved in data collection. The children have also been responsible for the selection of subject and construction of text. The language is their's and the subject matter of the text reflects what they feel is important in their environment.{We would like to thank {all the patient adults who have given {their time to us while we have been {compiling our view of the landscape, {industry, farming and lifestyles of {our area.
